item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls of the day: Nvidia, Tesla, Apple, Nike, Micron, Netflix & more
item.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Netflix gets an upgrade from MoffettNathanson, which sees stock rising 20%
item.description: The firm upgraded the streaming giant to buy from neutral.

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades this cruise stock, sees more than 55% upside ahead
item.description: The firm upgraded the cruise line operator to overweight from neutral.

item.title: Pioneering advisor conference comes to Miami Beach with volatility, crypto and AI as hot topics
item.description: This is the fifth Future Proof conference, and the first in Miami following conferences in Huntington Beach, Ca.

item.title: Tesla gets a price target cut from Mizuho, which warns of softening EV sales
item.description: Last week, the company warned it could face fresh headwinds due to retaliatory tariffs from countries responding to Trump's slate of duties.
